uk.ac.soton.itinnovation.sad.service.adapters

Class EccMetricClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.soton.itinnovation.sad.service.adapters.EccMetricClient

  • public class EccMetricClient
extends Object
    Communicates with EccMetricServer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EccMetricClient(String host, int port) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAttribute(String entity_name, String attribute_name, String description, String type, String unit)
      Tells the ECC server to add a new attribute and metric to the ECC metric model.

      Tells the ECC server to add a new entity to the ECC metric model.

      Reports proc user actions.

      Sends a message to the ECC socket server.

      Sends a new metric measurement to the ECC socket server.
      void start()
      Creates a new ECC socket client to host and port in the constructor.
      void stop()
      Stop the client and performs a clean shutdown.

        public EccMetricClient(String host,
               int port)

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Creates a new ECC socket client to host and port in the constructor.

      • sendMetric

        public void sendMetric(String entityName,
              String attributeName,
              String value)
        Sends a new metric measurement to the ECC socket server.
        Parameters:
        entityName - name of the entity the metric belongs to.
        attributeName - name of the attribute the metric belongs to.
        value - value of the measurement.

      • addEntity

        public void addEntity(String metricgenerator_name,
             String entity_name,
             String description)
        Tells the ECC server to add a new entity to the ECC metric model.
        Parameters:
        metricgenerator_name - name of the metric generator to use.
        entity_name - name of the new entity.
        description - description of the new entity.

      • addAttribute

        public void addAttribute(String entity_name,
                String attribute_name,
                String description,
                String type,
                String unit)
        Tells the ECC server to add a new attribute and metric to the ECC metric model.
        Parameters:
        entity_name - name of the entity to add the attribute to.
        attribute_name - name of the new attribute.
        description - description of the new attribute.
        type - metric type behind the new attribute.
        unit - unit of the new metric behind the attribute.

      • reportProv

        public void reportProv(String user_id,
              String user_action)
        Reports proc user actions.
        Parameters:
        user_id - unique user ID of the user performing the action.
        user_action - the name of the action.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(String msg,
               boolean waitForResponse)
        Sends a message to the ECC socket server.
        Parameters:
        msg - message as string.
        waitForResponse - if the client should wait for the response from the server.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop the client and performs a clean shutdown.
